mapper.select: SELECT question.*, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM answer WHERE answer.question_id = question.question_id) AS answer, customer.customer_id, customer.customer_nickname, customer.customer_photo FROM question LEFT JOIN customer ON question.publisher = customer.customer_id WHERE question.course_id = #{courseId} AND question.question_isenable = 0 ORDER BY question.create_time DESC
